column4: 7800gt nvidia card problem - ubuntu 6.06lts - latest drivers installed using kernel sources - headers - build essentials etc... seemed to install fine. xorg.conf configured fine. ubuntu still looks choppy, freezes after a few minutes.
well its been like 1 month now, that ive been trying to get help...
no one has helped at all...
I have same card but not using ubuntu yet, if you want pvmsg me I may be able to help anyway
